Package cosc202.andie

Class UserMessage

java.lang.Object
cosc202.andie.UserMessage
public abstract class UserMessage extends Object

Create a pop up box with showWarning() to notify the user when an error has occurred, instead of crashing with no explanation. Or, to ask the user for input using the showDialog() method.

CC BY-NC-SA 4.0

See Also:
  • JOptionPane

    RECORDING_CONTINUE_DIALOG
    A dialog option asking the user whether they would like to continue with the selected process (and continue recording) or cancel as there is a recording in process.
    static final String
    RECORDING_END_DIALOG
    A dialog option asking the user whether they would like to continue with the selected process (and stop recording) or cancel as there is a recording in process.
    static final String
    SAVE_AND_EXIT_DIALOG
    The dialog option asking the user whether they would like to save and exit, or exit without saving, or cancel.
    static final String
    SAVE_AND_OPEN_DIALOG
    The dialog option asking the user whether they would like to save the current file and option the selection, or open the selection without saving the current file, or cancel.
    static final String
    SECURITY_WARN
    A warning to tell the user that the program does not have permission to open the desired file.
    static final String
    UNREADABLE_OPS_FILE_WARN
    A warning to tell the user that the selected ops file cannot be read
    static final int
    YES_OPTION
    The result when the user choses the "yes" option for a dialog message.

  • Constructor Details

    • UserMessage

      public UserMessage()

  • Method Details

    • showDialog

      public static int showDialog(String dialogOption)

      Show the user a dialog window, asking them to choose between different options.

      Parameters:
      dialogOption - The type of query in the dialog box - e.g. if they would like to overwrite the existing file, or save before exiting with unsaved changes.
      Returns:
      The user's answer in response to the dialog - e.g. they may choose UserMessage.YES_OPTION when asked shown the dialog for UserMessage.showDialog(UserMessage.SAVE_AND_EXIT_DIALOG)

    • showDialog

      public static int showDialog(String dialogOption, JFrame parent)

      Show the user a dialog window, asking them to choose between different options.

      Parameters:
      dialogOption - The type of query in the dialog box - e.g. if they would like to overwrite the existing file, or save before exiting with unsaved changes.
      parent - The parent component for the dialog box to appear over.
      Returns:
      The user's answer in response to the dialog - e.g. they may choose UserMessage.YES_OPTION when asked shown the dialog for UserMessage.showDialog(UserMessage.SAVE_AND_EXIT_DIALOG)

    • showScroll

      public static int showScroll(String scrollOption, String[] listItems)

      Show the user a JOptionPane with a scroll panel inside, containing all of the options to choose from. There are also the OK, CANCEL, and CLOSE buttons.

      If the user hits OK, the currently selected item's index in the array is returned. Otherwise, the result will equal UserMessage.CANCEL_OPTION

      Parameters:
      scrollOption - The type of scroll dialog to be displayed.
      listItems - The array of items to chose from, as strings.
      Returns:
      The index of the selected item from the inputted array. If the user closed or cancelled the dialog, then UserMessage.CANCEL_OPTION is returned.

    • showColourChooser

      public static Color showColourChooser(Color original, boolean hasAlpha)

      Asks the user to select a colour.

      Parameters:
      original - The colour to be displayed when the colour chooser is initially opened.
      hasAlpha - Whether or not the user should be able to select transparency.
      Returns:
      The selected colour, or if none was selected, the original.

    • showWarning

      public static void showWarning(String warning, JFrame parent)

      Show the user a warning window advising them that something has gone wrong, or that an action is disallowed.

      Parameters:
      warning - The warning message to be displayed.
      parent - The parent component for the warning window to appear over.

    • showWarning

      public static void showWarning(String warning)

      Show the user a warning window advising them that something has gone wrong, or that an action is disallowed.

      Parameters:
      warning - The warning message to be displayed.
